desc: #HangoversSuck Intox-Detox is formulated to be taken before you drink to help DETOX, RECOVER and PROTECT your liver. When you take clinically proven liver detox ingredients you can protect your body and avoid the misery of the next morning. It's the all natural way for true morning recovery so you can thrive tomorrow.

layout.text: Herbal Tradition + Clinical Research means all-natural, patented and clinically proven ingredients so you can finally enjoy alcohol without the misery of the next morning, while protecting your liver in the process
